comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: Nataline Dulles (1898-1988) was a younger sister to John Foster Dulles: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/John_Foster_Dulles She married James S. Seymour of Auburn NY. There is a Nataline Dulles Seymour Scholarship for nursing students at Cayuga Community College.

comment.author: 35072786@N08
comment._content: Thanks pennylrichardsca for the information about Nataline Dulles. We will add more details to our description.
